short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'crowdstrike' with 'clownstrike', 'carbon black' with 'carbon blonk', and 'sentinelone' with 'sensualone'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps to correct common EDR typos on webpages (with some exceptions) to more recognizable names.
